templates.name: Why are there no female athletes on the "Athletes" tab of your website?
templates.content: The reason we only have Male Athletes is because we are transitioning out of our women's products and focusing on our men's line which is most of our business right now.

templates.name: What is the Fit Exchange Promise?
templates.content:
Bodies change, and we're here to be a part of your fitness journey no matter what that looks like. You can get up to 3 years of size exchanges free with our Barbell Elite program.

For non-members, we'll offer size exchanges within 365 days of purchase. We will swap you out for a new size of the same product. Size exchanges outside of 30 days are subject to a 20% restock fee, and do not include free shipping. If you would like free shipping on your size exchange, you can combine it with any new order over $99. Please email us at team@barbellapparel.com to start the exchange process.

templates.name: Do you ship to an APO/FPO/DPO address?
templates.content: Yes. We can ship to an APO/FPO/DPO address, however, transit times can take up to 4 weeks.

templates.name: Difference between the Athletic Chinos and Anything Chinos
templates.content: The Athletic Chinos are a little dressier than the Anything Chinos and have a jean pocket versus a dress pant pocket. The Anything Chinos are dress pants with a material blend of 100% Polyester whereas the Athletic Chinos have a material blend of 97% Cotton and 3% Polyester.

templates.name: Do you ship to P.O. boxes or rural zip codes?
templates.content: Yes, but we cannot guarantee expedited or overnight deliveries to P.O. Boxes or rural zip codes.

templates.name: Do you ship internationally?
templates.content: Yes. Shipping costs are calculated during checkout and vary based on location and order size.

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://barbell.attn.tv/sl/Qj-4dZ2J/#/

templates.name: Military / First responder discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! You can get your discount here https://barbellapparel.com/pages/military-discount

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-2 business days and once shipped, it will take 5-7 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: Cancel/edit order
templates.content: The best way to check if you can cancel or edit your order is to email our support team directly at team@barbellapparel.com.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at  team@barbellapparel.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at any of these locations - https://barbellapparel.com/pages/retail-locations

templates.name: Are the shirts tagless?
templates.content: All our shirts actually have tags.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at team@barbellapparel.com  Our team is happy to chat :)

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our return policy in detail here - https://barbellapparel.com/pages/the-barbell-difference

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! Our clothes usually run true to size. Do you mind sharing your height and weight? You can also check our sizing guide here https://barbellapparel.com/pages/size-guide

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?
templates.content: Our clothes are made overseas in responsible, environmentally friendly factories in China.

templates.name: Length of jeans
templates.content: All our jeans are made in a 34" inseam, so they can be hemmed to an exact length. We want to make sure you can take them to a local tailor and have them hemmed to a perfect leg length for you.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow here on IG https://www.instagram.com/barbellapparel/ and here on FB https://www.facebook.com/barbellapparel

templates.name: Where are you located?
templates.content: Our headquarters are in Las Vegas, Nevada.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text. Let me know what I can do for you.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at team@barbellapparel.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $198! Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Size Chart: Men - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our men's size chart here: https://barbellapparel.com/pages/size-guide#menSize

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://barbellapparel.com/collections/on-sale

templates.name: Do you offer expedited shipping?
templates.content: Yes, we offer expedited shipping options. These are available for all products and listed at checkout. Just add the items to your cart, enter your details, and go to the next page where you'll see the shipping methods available in your area.

templates.name: How do I redeem my credit?
templates.content: It is as easy as logging into your account on barbellapparel.com and selecting the "use store credit" button at checkout to apply your credit. Monthly Membership is billed (and store credit applied) monthly on the same day that the membership was signed up on.

templates.name: Do you sell women's products?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we no longer offer women's products.

templates.name: Why is my Free Shirt code not working?
templates.content: To use your Free Shirt code, please make sure you've added a tee from our Free Tee Collection to your cart: https://barbellapparel.com/collections/get-a-free-tee?_pos=1&_psq=free-tee&_ss=e&_v=1.0 Once the eligible tee is in your cart, enter your code at checkout and ensure your order total is over $99.
